channel.title: Volunteerhelpmarshal on Hopton 10k road and trail race, Yorkshire

item.title: Volunteers needed
item.description: Become a volunteer Love getting up early? Like to work for no money? Love running? Well please help out… Would you like to get involved with the Hopton 10k?
